div.bibl: El Mexicano, Vol. I, No. 1. April 20, 1934.

body.p: One hundred . April 19, at 9:20 registration of delegates, Conference presided by Rev. Franz and a time in charge of Dr. R. C. Schell. 10:000 A. M. special music and singing. 10:10 A. M. Government of the Church by Dr. J. E. Davies. 10:40 A. M. Business meeting. 11:00 A. M. Pauline Ecclesiology by Dr. Carlos L. . At 2:00 P. M. A program by the Feminine Association. 7:00 P. M. of Praise by Rev. . 7:15 P. M. Chorus by brothers from Indiana Harbor, Ind. 7:30 P. M. Introduction of visitors. 8:00 P. M. Mexico Today, by Roji, Consul of Mexico.

April 20, at 9:00 A. M. Commendation Service, by brother Tomas Montemayor. 9:15 "Modern Enemies of the Church" by Rev. Pablo J. Villonueva. 10:00 Business of the Convention. 10:30 The Church and its own support by Dr. E. R. Brown. 11:00 Pauline Ecclesiology by Dr. Carlos L. Deitweiler. 2:00 P. M. Essay: "The Church and the Religious Education" by Rev. F. M. Santiago. 2:30 Music and songs. 2:40 The Cooperative work of the Church by Dr. A. E. Paterson. 3:10 Special Music. 3:20 The Church and the Cospel by Dr. J. E. Davies. 4:00 "Offering of the Church to the Youth" by Rev. Armando Alvarado. 7:30 Service of Praise by brother Benjamin Morales. 7:45 Music by the Orchestra. 8:00 The Church and its Missions by Mr. J. E. April 21, at 9:00 A. M. Service of Commendation by brother 9:15 The Church and the Kingdon of Heaven by Rev. Castulo de Lara. 9:30 Special Music by the Century of Progress Orchestra. 10:00 Business Meeting. 11:00 Pauline by Dr. 2:00 P. M. Service of Praise by brother H. Boones. 2:15 Chorus by the South Chicago Church . 2:20 "Children of the Cross "Drama by the Youth of Chicago. 5:00 "The Church of the future" by Rev. Jose W. . 7:30 P. M. Service of by brother . Music by the "Century of Progress". 8:00 The word of the Holy Chost and the Church by Rev. Jose P. Ruiz.

April 22, 9:30 A. M. Bible School in charge of Rev. Frank Martinez. 11:00 Sermon by Rev. A. B. Apra. 2:00 P. M. Union Association of Baptist Youth. 7:30 Service of Preise by brother Manuel Martinez. 7:45 Music by the Orchestra. 8:00 P. M. Closing Germon by Rev. Pablo Villanneva.
